item.title: Create a Hugo site using With Azure Pipelines.
item.description: Goal: Hosting a static site generated using Hugo on Azure The entire site and all supporting processes will host in the Microsoft Azure cloud with Azure DevOps. In this post, I will explain how to host the site in Microsoft Azure. This assumes the example static files have already been built so you will see how it’s exposed to the world.
